clues.name: The Riddle & Crystal
clues.content:
All around is white, so bright it stings,
Yet in the corner, a dark one waits.
Under Perth’s fierce and burning sky,
It stays so still, so calm, so patient.
Where light meets sky, look low, not high—
A shining gift where peaceful hands lie.

(Find the Crystal. Use Crystal to ask Ghost YES/NO questions). Ghost doesn't give you straight Yes or No answer but will use gestures. You can ask 3 questions and you have to figure out what is Yes and No.

clues.name: Autopsy Report
clues.content: Toxin: Aconitum (Monkshood). Lethal. Likely ingested with food. Important: Identify who had access to the victim's meal.

clues.name: Chemist's Insight
clues.content: Chemicals used are similar to sleeping pills. Who has sleeping problems?

clues.name: Tech Guy's Hack (Text Message)
clues.content: Unknown Contact to Momo King: 'Are you sure about this? All I want is us to be together in business or not'

clues.name: Strange Question
clues.content: The Farmer was asking you weirdly specific questions about how to process/concentrate poison from wild berries.

clues.name: Overheard Conversation
clues.content: You overheard a tense conversation between The Farmer and The Momo King's Wife discussing 'poison berries' in the garden.
